name: タップ De ぷる萌え！ ももニャン
summary:
近所の空き地のダンボールの中に、
いつの間にやら住みついた彼女。　
どうやら捨て猫らしい・・・

Mysterious Nekomimi Girl "MomoNyan". she seems to have settled down in a corrugated cardboard case in nearby vacant lot before anyone knows. Perhaps she seems to be an abandoned cat. When I pass close to her,she always sits up in the case, and takes a long look at me. Apparently,she seems to want me to pick up...

When you tap her, she swings and you will
hear sweet and sarrow chirping.
Whatever you would like to do by using Hand!

Extra stage included
Please mind the sound.
Android 2.2 or later.
Requires Adobe AIR.
info:
